description: This file defines the RealtimeService class which manages WebSocket connections for real-time communication within a Flutter mobile application. It handles connecting to a WebSocket server, receiving and decoding messages, and disconnecting properly.

classes.name: RealtimeService
classes.description: A service class that manages WebSocket connections for real-time messaging, including connecting, disconnecting, and message streaming.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes a WebSocket connection, retrieves auth token for headers, and starts listening for incoming messages.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Cancels the message subscription and closes the WebSocket connection.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Closes the internal stream controller to free resources.
